author: nfx:MEDIA
description: Hypercharge WebPaymentForm allows you to use a variety of payment methods, both online and off-line. Any sensitive information is safely aquired an processed on out platform

de.2.1.6: fix sAGB checkbox name + minor CSS change // 2015-05-12
de.2.1.4: we don't send the customer phone in case is not set // 2015-04-14
de.2.1.3: some js and css changes for Connexco compatibility // 2015-02-05
de.2.1.2: add birthday to GTD Sepa Debit Sale + add WPF Kreditkarte payment method + set default option Redirect + fix checkout for redirect // 2015-01-21
de.2.1.1: do not enable the Payments anymore on enable() + remove UTF8 charset // 2014-12-12
de.2.0.10: add birthday validation as an option // 2014-10-28
de.2.0.9: add GtdSepaDebitSale + GtdPurchaseOnAccount + add risk_params to Purchase On Account // 2014-10-08
de.2.0.8: send shipping address for 'Purchase on Account' + change Mobile call fron jsonp to regular AJAX // 2014-09-15
de.2.0.7: avoid double click for WPF too + get client's birthday as default value + fix update() issue // 2014-08-11
de.2.0.4: add flag to avoid double click // 2014-07-11
de.2.0.3: Helper::appendRandomId + check error message on notify + disable submit button after the click // 2014-07-09
de.2.0.0: implement Mobile API + select WPF payment method in Shopware + iFrame for WPF // 2014-05-13
